articles.author: Howard Schneider
articles.description: The new Caesars casino in Danville, Virginia, is a temporary facility reminiscent of an airplane hangar and with limited food and drink options.
articles.title: Fed coming up snake eyes in its battle with spend-happy consumers

articles.author: Amruta Khandekar, Shristi A
articles.description: Wall Street's main indexes fell on Thursday, as an initial boost from Nvidia's stellar forecast fizzled out and investors turned cautious ahead of Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell's speech later this week that will offer clues on the interest rate path.
articles.title: Wall St falls as Nvidia boost fades, caution sets in ahead of Powell speech

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Frankfurt-listed shares of Nvidia jumped 8.7% on Thursday, lifting tech shares around the world, after the company forecast quarterly revenue that smashed expectations and announced a $25 billion buyback.
articles.title: Nvidia's Frankfurt shares surge as stellar results seen keeping AI rally alive

articles.author: Kanishka Singh
articles.description: The U.S. Justice Department sued Elon Musk-owned rocket and satellite company SpaceX on Thursday for allegedly discriminating against asylum seekers and refugees in hiring.
articles.title: US sues SpaceX, alleges hiring discrimination against asylum seekers, refugees

articles.author: Jonathan Stempel
articles.description: Whirlpool (WHR.N) agreed to pay an $11.5 million civil fine to resolve U.S. Consumer Product Safety Commission charges that it failed to immediately report that its glass cooktops could turn on by themselves, posing burn and fire hazards.
articles.title: Whirlpool is fined $11.5 mln by US agency over hazardous cooktops

articles.author: Davide Barbuscia, Carolina Mandl
articles.description: Recent shifts in the U.S. Treasury yield curve may indicate that market optimism around the economy could wane, with some investors looking at Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell's speech at an economic symposium on Friday as a potential trigger for a correction or rapid unwind in positions.
articles.title: Analysis: US Treasury yield curve shifts could be set-up for Jackson Hole unwind

articles.author: Elizabeth Howcroft, Tom Wilson
articles.description: Mastercard (MA.N) and crypto exchange Binance will end their four crypto card programmes in Argentina, Brazil, Colombia and Bahrain as of Sept. 22, a spokesperson for Mastercard said via email on Thursday.
articles.title: Mastercard, Binance to end crypto card partnership

articles.author: Andrew Osborn
articles.description: Crash investigators on Thursday picked through the wreckage of a jet said to have been carrying Russian mercenary chief Yevgeny Prigozhin that crashed with no survivors, two months after he led a mutiny against the army leadership.
articles.title: Yevgeny Prigozhin: Investigators trawl site of plane crash believed to have killed Wagner boss

articles.author: Jack Queen
articles.description: Donald Trump is due to report to an Atlanta jail on Thursday to face charges stemming from his effort to overturn his 2020 election loss, in the fourth criminal case to hit the former president this year.
articles.title: Trump to report to Atlanta jail to face charges in election-subversion case

articles.author: Julie Zhu, Fanny Potkin, Eduardo Baptista, Michael Martina
articles.description: For a decade until 2018, China sought to recruit elite foreign-trained scientists under a lavishly funded program that Washington viewed as a threat to U.S. interests and technological supremacy.
articles.title: China quietly recruits overseas chip talent as US tightens curbs
